aegis.pickup: میتونه یه غذای رایگان بده {{- heroName}}

betaTester_off: {{channel}} is no longer a beta tester. Type !beta to join again
betaTester_on: {{channel}} is now a beta tester. Visit discord.dotabod.com to see the beta features. Type !beta to undo

bets.lost: این رو که باختیم. عب نداره بعدی هم لوزه
bets.notScored: همه بازی رو دبه کردن {{emote}} بازی {{matchId}} هیچ تاثیری نداشت
bets.remade: Swapped hero {{emote}} Bets for {{- oldHeroName}} refunded and new gamba for {{- newHeroName}} opened {{emote2}}
bets.won: بلاخره بردیم. یک تنه بازی رو حمل کردم

chatters.died: درخشیدی {{- heroName}} . {{itemNames}}  را نگه دار واسه بازی بعد {{emote}}
chatters.tpFound: {{channel}} nice job finally getting a tp after $t(seconds, {"count": {{seconds}} }) {{emote}}
chatters.tpFromDeath: Thanks to this death you finally got a tp. And it only took $t(seconds, {"count": {{seconds}} }) {{emote}}

commandDisabled: Streamer disabled {{cmdName}} command {{emote}} Check !commands for the enabled ones
dota2pt: میخوای چیز جدید واسه قهرمان {{- heroName}} یاد بگیری؟ این اینک رو چک کن {{- url}}
dotabod: I'm an open source bot made by {{author}}. More info: {{- url}}
gpm_one: Live GPM: {{num}}. {{heroKills}} from hero kills, {{creepKills}} from creep kills.
gpm_other: Live GPM: {{num}}. {{heroKills}} from hero kills, {{creepKills}} from creep kills.

heroItems.empty: (2m delay) No items found for {{- heroName}}

invalidColor: Invalid hero color, slot, or name. Try 1-10, a partial hero name, or a color from {{colorList}}
invalidMmr: داداچ اشتباه میزنی. این رو بزن  !setmmr 1234

lastgame.none: با هیچ اکانت بایری از بازی قبل بازی نمیکنه! همه جدیدن
lastgame.player: {{- currentMatchHero}} توی بازی قبل با {{- lastMatchHero}} غذا میداد

lastgamescore.double: بریم دوبله رنک رو به فنا بدیم
lastgamescore.lost: بازی قبلی: فقط غذا دادم و باختیم

matchFound: بازی شروع شد. تمام این کامندها فعال است {{commandList}}
missingUser: User not found. Try logging out and in of dotabod.com
modsOnly_off: فقط مادها خاموش شد! همه میتونن چت کنن
modsOnly_on: فقط مادها! کسی دیگه نمیتونه چت کنه {{emote}}
multiAccount: This steam account is already connected to another Dotabod user. Check dashboard for more info {{- url}}
noNotable: غذا دهنده معروفی در بازی نیست
npRemoved: {{steamid}} را از !np برای این کانال حذف شد
overlayMissing: Overlay not found. The {{command}} command requires the overlay to be added.

predictions.title: غذا میدیم ولی میبریم با {{- heroName}}

privateProfile: Streamer's profile is private. The {{command}} command uses OpenDota and requires them to enable 'Expose Public Match Data' in their Dota settings.

roshanCount.1: روشان اول. روشان بعدی آقانیم شارد
roshanCount.2: روشان دوم. روشان بعدی پنیر و آقانیم یا رفرش شارد
roshanCount.3: روشان سوم. روشان بعدی پنیر و آقانیم و رفرش
roshanCount.more_one: Rosh deaths: {{count}} · Next drop: cheese, agh's blessing, and refresher shard.
roshanCount.more_other: Rosh deaths: {{count}} · Next drop: cheese, agh's blessing, and refresher shard.

roshanKilled: روشان رو کوشتن. روشان بعدی بین {{min}} تا {{max}} دقیقه
stream_off: Dotabod will treat {{channel}} as offline. Type !online to undo
stream_on: Dotabod will treat {{channel}} as online. Type !offline to undo
streamDelayNone: There is no stream delay on this channel
toggle_disabled: بات غیرفعال شد. برای فعال سازی مجدد  !toggle  بزن
toggle_enabled: بات فعال شد. برای غیرفعال سازی مجدد  !toggle  بزن
toggleMatch_double: Changing this match to double down mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixdd to undo
toggleMatch_party: Changing this match to party mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixparty to undo
toggleMatch_single: Changing this match to single down mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixdd to undo
toggleMatch_solo: Changing this match to solo mmr: {{- url}} Type !fixparty to undo
treadToggle_one: We toggled treads {{count}} time to save a total {{manaCount}} mana this match.
treadToggle_other: We toggled treads {{count}} times to save a total {{manaCount}} mana this match.
uknownMmr: I don't know {{channel}}'s MMR yet. Mods have to !setmmr 1234 or set it in {{- url}}
unknownSteam: Could not find steam account. Follow Step 2 of setup, play a bot match, and try again.
updateMmr_auto: Updated MMR to {{mmr}}. !fixparty for party and !fixdd for doubledown
updateMmrMulti: Multiple steam accounts, updating the one you are currently logged in with ({{steamId}})

version.commit: Server running version {{version}}, here's what's missing compared to the latest version: {{- url}}
version.unknown: Couldn't find the last git commit, here's the repo {{- url}}
